Hilda.line: Oh, that's Tom. Santos' son. Yes, I know how it sounds.
It sounds cruel, doesn't it? A 17-year-old boy working with men twice his age, crushed under stress, inexperience and bottled-up rage.

Elliot.line: When you put it like that, yes, I agree...

Hilda.line: Well, the one who asked for it was Tom himself. I mean, partially. Santos threw the bait, and Tom bit it.

Elliot.line: Huh... Why do you think he did that?

Hilda.line: Me? I think Tom's trying to prove something. Maybe to his father, maybe to himself. Over and over I gave him chances to rest and stop, but he wouldn't. It would be impressive, if it wasn't so damn idiotic.
